item.title: Sevenhugs' Smart Remote
item.description:
Sevenhugs' Smart Remote

Looking to simplify the endless number of apps and interfaces used to control smart-home products, French start-up Sevenhugs has introduced the first "contextually aware" universal Smart Remote. In other words, it's the first remote to understand where it is in your home and what it's pointing at, allowing users to simply point and click to control devices instead of switching between apps.

item.title: Techies Project by Photographer Helena Price
item.description:
Techies Project by Photographer Helena Price

The two words "Silicon Valley" immediately stir up stereotypes, stigma and maybe an HBO show. The name has become a cultural reflex, and that's what photographer Helena Price wants to change with her ambitious, large-scale portrait and interview series. Techies Project, launched today, is a collection of 100 in-depth interviews that breaks this idea of the "sameness" plaguing the area.

item.title: Reduced Spoke Bicycles : Conceptual Bike
item.description:
Reduced Spoke Bicycles : Conceptual Bike

Conceptual Bike - Ion Lucin has simplified the design of a standard two-wheeler with his conceptual bike Baik that opts for three-spoked wheels, a limited use of lin...
